snippet.title: FAIRY TAIL 2 - PV1
snippet.description:
Visit the website: https://fairytailgame.com/2/uk/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=PV1UK&utm_id=Caption

The final battle of FAIRY TAIL is about to begin.

FAIRY TAIL 2 is scheduled to release 13th December 2024 on PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, and 12th December 2024 on Steam®.

FAIRY TAIL is ready to attack the Alvarez Empire as fierce battles unfold, culminating in an epic encounter against the Black Dragon Acnologia! In addition, magic battles have been completely redesigned and enhanced!

Follow us: 
X: https://x.com/koeitecmoeurope
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/koeitecmoeurope/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/koeitecmogames
Gust Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ateliergames
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/KTEurope

Based on the manga “FAIRY TAIL” by Hiro Mashima originally serialized in the weekly SHONEN MAGAZINE published by KODANSHA Ltd.
©Hiro Mashima, KODANSHA/FAIRY TAIL Committee, TV TOKYO
©KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.

*Screens are taken from an in-development version.
